data.title: INTERACTIVE on LinkedIn: SmarTone names new marketing and product director
data.meta_description:
SmarTone has appointed Judy Lam(pictured) as its new marketing and product director.¬†She will report to SmarTone‚Äôs CEO Fiona Lau.

In this newly created role‚Ä¶
data.text:
Food and grocery delivery platform foodpanda recently launched a bold and cheeky #campaign in Singapore where it vowed to bring excitement to Singapore‚Äôs ‚Äúmost boring‚Äù neighbourhood #YewTee, by treating all 53,000 households in the district to unlimited free deliveries with a complimentary one-month #pandapro subscription. The out-of-the-box campaign, definitely caught the attention of social media #netizens, with several questioning the decision to limit the promotion to Yew Tee, and even making a call for foodpanda to extend the offer to other neighbourhoods, reflecting a desire for a more inclusive approach, said media monitoring company Truescope. When MARKETING-INTERACTIVE reached out to foodpanda, Darryl Chua, marketing director of foodpanda Singapore said that the reception to its campaign has been overwhelmingly positive thus far. #SocialMedia

Malaysia boasts two national celebrations: #HariMerdeka (Merdeka Day) and #MalaysiaDay. While both commemorate significant milestones in the nation's history, they hold distinct cultural and commercial potential for marketers. Understanding their unique significance and audience appeal is crucial for crafting impactful #marketing strategies and with #advertising budgets tight, the question arises: Which of these patriotic occasions should marketers channel their advertising dollars into? Let's hear from Casey Loh, Douglas R Tan and syahriza badron. #AdSpend

Global creator and IP management and licensing company Gushcloud International has signed a total of 27 exclusive #talents in five countries for the first half of the year, further boosting its #leadership in the Southeast Asian creator economy. ‚ÄúWe are excited to officially welcome the new members to our #Gushcloud talent agency family. These young #creators are brimming with #creativity, #collaboration, and energy. More importantly, they harness their influence to drive positive change within their #SocialMedia fans, which perfectly aligns with Gushcloud‚Äôs mission of creating positive influence for future generations," said Nirote Chaweewannakorn, head of talent in Southeast Asia and country director of Thailand, #GushcloudInternational. #partnership

Singapore Airlines has released a special rendition of the 2011 #NationalDay theme song In A Heartbeat to celebrate Singapore's 59th birthday. The rendition was performed by members of the #SingaporeAirlines cabin crew music society. Accompanying the rendition is a #MusicVideo featuring leading stewardess Krystel, flight stewardess Tricia, flight steward Ming, chief steward Roushan, in-flight manager Halim and leading steward Sam as singers and band members. #airlines #campaign

Hey digital marketers, listen up! Are you totally confused about the future of search with SearchGPT picking up? Well, join us and earn the chance to ask these questions directly to marketing guru Neil Patel at Digital Marketing Asia 2024 on 1-2 October 2024 at Marina Bay Sands Singapore! Neil will be joined by renowned speakers from Tesla, Tiffany & Co., Ministry of Health (Singapore), PepsiCo and many others! Register now at https://lnkd.in/gegbPyM4 and see you there üòâ #DigitalMarketingAsia

#MalaysiaAirlines has released a statement of #apology to passengers impacted by the delay of flight MH165 from Doha to Kuala Lumpur which was bound to fly on 12 August. The delay reportedly impacted subsequent flights between Kuala Lumpur and Doha on 13 and 14 August too. In its #statement, Malaysia Airlines said it is working hard to resolve the issues related to its aircraft engine and is committed to minimising further disruptions to its operations, reported #NewStraitsTimes. #airlines

Artificial intelligence (#AI) is not a substitute for humans but can serve as a tool to foster #creativity, particularly within the field of #journalism, communications minister Fahmi Fadzil reportedly said. The minister reportedly said that AI has not made it possible for #media practitioners to work using the technology to produce #NewsReports or record events. He added that he does not believe AI has the capability to fully replace #journalists in tasks such as reporting from the field, reported #TheStar. #tech

Incentives and talent support to empower small businesses are among matters the #digital ministry will prioritise in the upcoming 2025 budget, digital minister Gobind Singh Deo reportedly said. The minister reportedly said that while #technology has the potential to aid SMEs and MSMEs, a digital infrastructure is insufficient if it is not effectively utilised. #TalentSupport #2025Budget

DBS Bank Hong Kong has launched a new campaign to refresh its #DBSTreasures wealth management service, introducing the new slogan "Wealth intelligence to enrich your life" (Êô∫ÊÖßÊô∫ËÉΩ Ë±êÁõõ‰∫∫ÁîüÊØè‰∏ÄÊ≠•). Done in #collaboration with creative agency Potassium and media agency Wavemaker, the campaign started on Monday (12 August) and will run for eight weeks. Julie Chiu, executive director, head of marketing and marketing communications, #DBSHongKong consumer banking and wealth management, said: ‚ÄúWe have taken a bold step to pioneer this unconventional story-telling approach, by listening to the real voices of the popular Hong Kong celebrity trio. This relates perfectly to how DBS Treasures stands by our customers to help them realise their life goals.‚Äù Keith Ho, founder and chief executive officer of Potassium, said: ‚ÄúBy capturing the natural chemistry between this trio, we created an emotionally powerful campaign that truly showcases the breadth and accessibility of DBS Treasures.‚Äù #bank #campaign
